mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crosman, George H. to Crothers, H. W.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Crosman, George H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col HW Crothers Wheeling Nov 11 1861. By Telegraph from Philada 11 1861. Telegram rec'd part of the great coats sent fourth & fifteenth insts will send the rest of the supplies as soon as it is possible GH Crosman Dept QM Genl 25W115&110Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crosman, George H.
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Crothers, H. W.
